biotools.summary: AIScaffold is a web-based tool for scaffold diversification using the deep generative model. AIScaffold can perform large-scale diversification in several minutes and recommend the top 500 molecules. Features such as site-specific diversification are also supported. This tool can facilitate the scaffold diversification process for medicinal chemists, thereby accelerating drug design.
